image_prompt: A photo-realistic, high-quality hero image of a modern industrial manufacturing facility. In the foreground, a diverse group of maintenance engineers (men and women) wearing hard hats, safety glasses, and high-visibility vests are looking at a large industrial machine. One engineer is pointing at a sensor attached to a motor. The lighting is professional and cinematic, highlighting the clean, high-tech nature of modern manufacturing. No text or words should be visible in the image. The background shows a depth of field with other machinery and yellow safety walkways. The atmosphere conveys collaboration, technology, and industrial reliability.
